name: Duplicate Page/Post/Custom Post Type
author: VIITORCLOUD

sections.description:
Duplicate Me plugin is useful to clone data of page, post and custom post type in backend.

No coding required.

Compatible with classic editor and gutenberg editor.

Simply download Duplicate Me plugin, activate it, You will find option in column list, Begin clone your posts and pages today.

Get Involved

ViitorCloud believes in an active community support so with such plugins we try to make life easy for developers & of course customers. Don’t forget to subscribe our newsletter.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can go through wordpress post/page backend.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin?
You can find duplicate Me option besides view in column list of pages, posts and custom post types.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 * First public release.
1.0.0 * Support to custom post types
1.0.0 * Compatible with your latest wordpress version
